item.title: New Genetic Test Could Diagnose Brain Tumours in 2 Hours
item.description: A new rapid test developed in Nottingham could cut brain tumour diagnosis from weeks to hours, helping speed up access to treatment across the UK. Med...

item.title: Chatbot Helps Users Adopt a Low FODMAP Diet
item.description: Chatbot-assisted dietary advice can reduce high FODMAP intake and bloating and improve dietary knowledge, new research shows. Medscape Medical News

item.title: BLVR Requires Revision in 20% of Patients
item.description: Granulomas are the most common cause of loss of treatment effect. Medscape Medical News
